name: Blip (IndieCoyote)
description:
Developed By Nathan Cote

PATCH NOTES  |  VERSION 1.0.1  |  9/11/19

Added wave count in between waves.

GAME RELEASE  |  VERSION 1.0.0  |  9/10/19

This is my first game that I have ever made. It is a top-down shooter called Blip. You are a robot named Blip and you try to defend yourself against monsters and beat the final boss to win. I hope you all like my game, please give me feedback as I want to improve my game development skills. Thanks! :)
